backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the backend canister with per-user exercise library and workout session management, including CRUD operations for exercise templates and workout sessions with sorting/querying capabilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three bug-fix features (perpetual loading spinner, non-functional Add Exercise button, and actor initialization audit) to their relevant frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summary document describing the purpose and key implementation details of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Track-A-Swole' that mounts the app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes including home, login, exercise library, session creation, active workout, history, and session detail pages.
Form component for adding a new exercise template with name, three default sets (weight/reps), and comments fields, using the useAddExercise mutation hook with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/CompletedExercis: Read-only card component that displays a completed workout exercise's sets, weights, reps, and optional comments in a styled table layout.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseListItem: Renders a single exercise template list item with inline editing (name, sets, comments) and delete functionality, using mutation hooks and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ExercisePicker.t: Dropdown selector component that lets users pick an exercise from their library and add it to a session via a callback.
Collapsible card for tracking a single exercise during a workout, displaying set input rows and a comments textarea with visual indicators for entered data.
frontend/src/components/HistorySessionCa: Displays a summary card for a past workout session (name, date, exercise count) that navigates to the session detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component providing the app shell with header, bottom navigation, authentication guard, and logout functionality using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/SessionExerciseL: Renders an ordered list of selected exercises for a session with up/down reordering and remove controls.
frontend/src/components/SetInputRow.tsx: Simple reusable row component with number inputs for weight and reps for a single set.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated (or anonymous) ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and persisting identity via AuthClient from the DFINITY SDK.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on exercises and workout sessions, wrapping backend actor calls with caching and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ActiveWorkout.tsx: Page component for an in-progress workout session that restores exercise data from localStorage or URL params, tracks sets per exercise, and submits the completed session to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/CreateSession.tsx: Page component for creating a new workout session, allowing the user to name the session, pick exercises from their library, and navigate to the active workout page.
frontend/src/pages/ExerciseLibrary.tsx: Page component that displays the user's exercise templates in a list with options to add new exercises via a dialog, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page for Track-A-Swole app displaying navigation cards linking to Exercise Library, New Session, Workout History, and Progress sections with amber/orange gradient styling.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity, redirecting to home on success, with a branded card UI and GeekDice footer.
frontend/src/pages/SessionDetail.tsx: Detail view for a single workout session fetched by ID, displaying session name, date, and a list of completed exercises using CompletedExerciseDisplay.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutHistory.tsx: Page that fetches and lists all past workout sessions using useWorkoutHistory, showing loading, error, empty, and populated states via HistorySessionCard components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, oklch-based design tokens, custom border radii, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a known bug where the Exercise Library page shows a perpetual spinner and unresponsive Add Exercise button, with three existing fix-focused feature entries targeting actor initialization and query error surfacing in useQueries.ts.
